text: Antoine Gizenga (5 October 1916 – 24 February 2019) was a Congolese politician. He was the Prime Minister of the Democratic Republic of the Congo from 30 December 2006Joe Bavier, "Congo names opposition veteran, 90, prime minister", Reuters, 30 December 2006. to 10 October 2008."DR Congo president names new prime minister: report" , AFP, 10 October 2008. He is the Secretary- General of the Unified Lumumbist Party (Parti Lumumbiste Unifié, PALU). Gizenga was born in Mushiko, Bandundu. He died on 24 February 2019 in Kinshasa, aged 102.Decès de l'ancien Premier ministre congolais, Antoine Gizenga ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1925 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Prime ministers of the Democratic Republic of the Congo
title: Antoine Gizenga
